snippet.title: Heaven Burns Red - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Heaven Burns Red is now officially available on Google Play, the App Store, and Windows!

USE HEADPHONES FOR BETTER EXPERIENCE🎧

Download at: https://bit.ly/3Y2fB5g

Official Website: http://heavenburnsred.yo-star.com

Official X: x.com/hbr_official_en

Official Facebook: facebook.com/hbr.en.official/
 
Heaven Burns Red is a story-driven RPG that tells the tale of the girls bearing humanity's last hope.
Creators:
＜Produced and Developed by＞
　Wright Flyer Studios × Key
＜Original Concept & Main Scenario ＞
　Jun Maeda
＜Character Design／Key Visual＞
　yuugen
＜Original Character Design＞
　Na-Ga／Humuyun／Maroyaka／yuugen
＜Music Production＞
　Jun Maeda
＜Theme Song＞
　Jun Maeda × yanaginagi
 
©WFS Developed by WRIGHT FLYER STUDIOS ©VISUAL ARTS/Key Published by Yostar Games

#HeavenBurnsRed #Yostar
